text: Gidip de varmamak, varıp da dönmemek var ana.
english: going and never arriving, and arriving and never returning, mother. May you
forgive me. Well done,
son. My son, whom
I swaddled in a stuffed cradle, whom I embraced with my love...

text: ...gözümün nuru, canımın parçası, ömrümün goncası oğul.
english: ...the light of my eyes, the piece of my soul, the bud of my life. May

text: Ananın duaları sana iki kanatlı binek olsun.
english: your mother's prayers be your winged mount.
Thank you, Mom, thank you.
(Music)
Dad.
Wow, my brave men!
You are the pillar of our tent.

text: Siz dik durasınız ki otağımız da başımız da sağlam dursun.
english: You must stand tall so that our tent and our heads may remain strong.
Osman...
...the tent is entrusted to you.
Come on, my brave men.
(Music)

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa! Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa!
english: (All together) Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Ertuğrul Bey!

text: Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa! Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa!
english: Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Ertuğrul Bey!

text: Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa! Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa!
english: Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Ertuğrul Bey!

text: Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa! Ertuğrul Bey çok yaşa!
english: Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Ertuğrul Bey!
We have
seen many cruel and treacherous people.

text: Ah demedik, gidilmez denen yerlere gittik.
english: We didn't say "oh," we went to places they said were inaccessible.
We overcame mountains that were considered insurmountable.
Now, in the dawn's breeze, there is a new redness...
...a new pang of birth.

text: Bu sadece karanlığı aydınlıktan ayıracak yeni bir günün değil...
english: This is not merely the birth of a new day that will separate darkness from light ...
...but the birth of a new order...
...a new era.
And now the moment we've been waiting for has arrived.
For years we sowed salt and shared bread. There's a way to

text: Gitmek var, belki de dönmek yok.
english: leave, but perhaps no way back. Please forgive me for any
wrongs I may have done.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Helal olsun! Helal olsun!
english: (All together) Well done! Well done ! Well done
! Well done! We were not among those who turned away from this world, over which

text: Bir nefesine bile hükmedemediğimiz şu cihandan dönenlerden...
english: we have no control even for a single breath ...
...we were not among those who showed discouragement or fled. We
won't be.

text: İmdi vakit, kaderi kederle yoğrulan mazlum Anadolu'ya...
english: Now is the
time to stamp the seal of resurrection on oppressed Anatolia, whose fate is intertwined with sorrow.
Allahu Akbar!

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Allâhu ekber! Allâhu ekber!
english: (All together) Allahu Akbar! Allahu Akbar!
Allahu Akbar!
Allahu Akbar! Allahu Akbar!
-Allahu Akbar! -Allahu Akbar!
Allahu Akbar! Allahu Akbar!

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa!
english: Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Ertuğrul Bey!

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa!
english: Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Ertuğrul Bey!

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa!
english: Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Ertuğrul Bey!

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa!
english: Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Ertuğrul Bey!
Long live Ertuğrul Bey!
(The horse neighs)
Long live Ertuğrul Bey!

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa!
english: Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Let the

text: Aşılmaz, yalçın tepeler sana yaylak olsun.
english: insurmountable, rugged hills be your summer pasture.
(Hayme) May the wind not touch your face, and no stone touch your foot.
My child.
Have a safe journey, Ertuğrul Bey. Goo
(Horses neighing)
(Music)

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa!
english: Long live Ertuğrul Bey! Long live Ertuğrul Bey!
Oh, the legacy of my grandfather Suleyman Shah. My
ancestor's legacy: the white tent. I swear I will make
you the fear of the oppressor...
...the refuge of the oppressed.
(Music...)
O heavenly weapon, the support of our kingdom! I swear I will not put you back in your sheath

text: Bütün zalimler tükenene kadar seni kınına sokmamak andım olsun.
english: until all tyrants are gone .
(Music)

text: Ey atalarımın tamgasını gök bağrında saklayan kutlu sancak!
english: O blessed banner, which holds the emblem of my ancestors in the heart of the heavens ! I swear I will

text: Seni cihanın dört bir yanına taşımak...
english: carry you to the four corners of the world...
...and let your name wave proudly on the battlements.

text: (Osman iç ses) Madem yeniden şahlanış olacak...
english: (Osman's inner voice) Since there will be a resurgence...
...since the world is pregnant with a new revival...

text: ...o vakit bizler de bu dirilişin sancaktarı olacağız inşallah.
english: ...then, God willing, we too will be the standard-bearers of this revival.
(Music)
(Horse neighing)
(Music...)
(Music)
Come on, my brave men. In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the
Most Merciful.
(Music)

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Ey dünya semasını yıldız ziynetleriyle süsleyen!
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) O You who adorn the world's sky with the jewels of stars!
(Ertuğrul's voiceover) O you who move the clouds!

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Ey toplanmış orduları bozguna uğratan Allah'ım!
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) O God, who defeats the assembled armies!

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Sen ki karanlığın ardında nice güneşler gizleyensin.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) You who conceal countless suns behind the darkness.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Dağılmış İslam âlemi bir aydınlık...
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) The scattered Islamic world awaits a light...
...a hope, a salvation.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Bizi bu kurtuluşa vesile eyle.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) Make us the means of this salvation.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Bizi bu yüce davanın sancaktarı eyle.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) Make us the standard-bearers of this noble cause.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) O kutlu sancağın altında...
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) Under that blessed banner... ...May God grant

text: ...Âlem-i İslam'ı bir kılmayı bize nasip eyle.
english: us the ability to unite the Islamic world.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Mahmuzlayıp, dört bir yana sürülen atlarımızı...
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) Spur our horses, which are being driven in all directions...
...make them gallop.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Adalet için kalkan kılıcımızı kavi eyle.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) Strengthen our sword, which we raise for justice.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Üstümüzde parıldayan bu güneş...
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) May this sun shining above us...
...be a harbinger of the light that will dawn upon our homeland .

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Yalnız bugünü değil, önümüzdeki nice asırları aydınlatacak...
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) May this be the beginning of a brand new day, one that will illuminate not only today, but also many centuries to come...
(Ertuğrul's voiceover) Amen. Amine.
(Ertuğrul's voiceover) Amen.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Onlar güneşi bayrak, göğü çadır eylediler.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) They made the sun their banner and the sky their tent.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Kısraklarını uçsuz bucaksız ovalara sürdüler.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) They drove their mares across the vast plains.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Pusatlarını yâr eyleyip, ordularını gür kıldılar.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) They made their weapons their companions , and their armies were mighty.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Daha çok denize, daha çok toprağa ilahi muştuyu taşıdılar.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) They carried the divine message more to the sea, more to the land.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Onlar, ümitlerin tükendiği bir çağda...
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) In an age when all hope had been lost...
...they became the name of resurrection...
...and they proclaimed it to the whole world.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Sonsuza kadar adalet! Sonsuza kadar hürriyet!
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) Justice forever! Freedom forever!
(Prayer being recited)

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Bu hikâye bir fetih rüyası görenlerindir.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) This story is for those who dream of conquest.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Yılmadan mücadele edenlerindir.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) It belongs to those who struggle tirelessly.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Çileye talip olanlarındır.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) It belongs to those who seek asceticism.
(Ibn Arabi's voiceover) This epic...
(Theme music)
